title: A Moon Among Stars
description: For 4.53 billion years, the moon has worked the night shift, spending night after night in the darkness, watching families dream of the next morning when the sun rises. The sun has all the fun! People always enjoy the sun, and the moon is fed up! Our moon has decided to call it quits.Oh no! What would happen if there wasnâ€™t a moon in the night sky among the stars? Is the moon important?
author: Jessica Dever
